section.title: Code Style with Checkstyle
section.para: With checkstyle there is a (limited) possibility to check your code formatting that it aligns according to this guide. There are some issues in checkstyle that report false positives. In this case you can use the following format of a comment to ignore a warning for th the given line.

example.title: Ignoring a chackstyle warning
example.programlisting: ... // follow the exact format of the comment: "// @checkstyle.ignore(<warn1>|<warn2>) - <comment> final long results[] = new long[CYCLES]; // @checkstyle.ignore(ArrayTypeStyle) - A bug in checkstyle. ...

section.para: You can see the output with each build and also by calling mvn checkstyle:check. A report is created when the site goal is executed. To get just this report call mvn checkstyle:checkstyle.
The resulting report can be found in the target/site/checkstyle.html directory.
